alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 3:04PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern St. Johns, northeastern Clay and southeastern Duval Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 304 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Switzerland, or near Fruit Cove, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Green Cove Springs, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, World Golf Village, Palm Valley, Sawgrass, South Ponte Vedra, Nocatee, Bayard and Durbin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; Western Clay
